issue.title: [C++] Add rows scanned to open telemetry / profiling
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15529](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15529). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's not described at https://duckdb.org/dev/profiling but this is included in DuckDB's profiling and was helpful in looking at their scans to see the benefits of predicate push down

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15529?focusedCommentId=17565673) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
